edu.umd.cs.psl.model.atom

Class Atom

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.umd.cs.psl.model.atom.Atom
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Formula
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    GroundAtom, QueryAtom

    public abstract class Atom
extends java.lang.Object
implements Formula
    A Predicate combined with the correct number of Terms as arguments.

    Two Atoms are equal if their Predicate and arguments are equal. Note that this means that their truth values might not match, or one might even be a QueryAtom.
